pages.text: Once you have created your Portal you will need a key, for which you will require: $(li)A Blaze Rod$(li)A NameTag$(br)You will almost certainly want multiple keys, so you should craft as many as you can now.

Blank keys cannot be used to enter a dungeon until they have been activated. Activating a key inscribes the name and location of a randomly generated dungeon on the key.$(br2)The activation ritual requires you to 'use' ($(k:use)) the $(item)blank key$() on the hole in an end portal frame. The end portal frame does not need to be part of a valid end portal.

If all the end portal frames are occupied, you can use the key to break the $(item)eye of ender$() in one of the frames, this does not break the portal.$(br2)Once you have activated a key, you can 'use' ($(k:use)) the key in the keyhole block of a valid portal. 'Using' ($(k:use)) the keyhole of an active portal will remove the key and close the portal.
